block.p: REICH-Bernard. On October 25, 2000, of Lambertville, NJ, formerly of New York City. Beloved companion of Barbara Grigg Moses. Loving father of Lauran Vieland and Mr. and Mrs. Randal (Karen) Reich. Dear grandfather of Sonia, Rose, Julia and Justin; also extended family Kimberly, Kevin, Will and Annie Parham and Christopher Russak. Memorial services Monday, October 30, 10:30 AM, at St. Thomas Episcopal Church, 98 Sky Manor Rd., Box 348, Pittstown, N.J. 08867. Memorial donations may be made to the church.
